caption.title: Relative mRNA expression levels of apoptotic-associated genes in (A) MCF-7 and (B) WEHI-164 were assessed by qRT-PCR. The cells were treated with 48-h IC 50 concentrations of DCM and MeOH extracts of S. amplexicaulis for 24 h. Data are presented as the mean Â± SEM of three independent experiments. **P < 0.01, ***P < 0.001 compared with the untreated control.
